729895f-a.text:
326 Westervelt Avenue, at the N.W. corner of Bensiger Avenue. The maps from 1874 to 1907 show the house to have been owned by the Benmiger family. In 1917 it was the property of
Grace W. R. Clark.
December 26, 1926
P. L. Sperr
729895f-a.folder: Westervelt Avenue & Benziger Avenue, Staten Island, NY
